news.title: CRISPR/Cas9 Deployed as Cellular Historian
news.summary: NEW YORK (GenomeWeb) – Scientists are using CRISPR/Cas9 genome editing to record a cell's history in its own DNA, answering questions such as where the cell came from in development, also known as cell lineage tracing, and what biochemical events it…
